subject: Football
Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
lead_paragraph: Some N.F.L. players from Washington and St. Louis have openly protested the actions of the police in Missouri, shedding light on a sensitive issue. The two teams play on Sunday.
snippet: Some N.F.L. players from Washington and St. Louis have openly protested the actions of the police in Missouri, shedding light on a sensitive issue. The two teams play on Sunday.
